alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 10:50AM MST until February 21 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected today. For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 40 to 60 mph with gusts of 75 to 85 mph expected tonight and Wednesday. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Damage may occur to mobile homes, roofs, sheds, barns, outbuildings, and fences. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be very difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Areas of blowing dust may reduce visibility below 1/2 mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of heavy snow and blowing snow may produce very low visibility Wednesday in the higher terrain around Ruidoso. Several inches of snow are possible with blizzard-like conditions and slick travel.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
